meanings.sent1: The amplexuses of the frogs showed their strong bond.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the amplexuses of various animal species.
meanings.sent3: The zookeeper chuckled at the amplexuses of the playful otters.
meanings.sent4: The intertwined amplexuses of the vines created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The amplexuses of the dancers on stage captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: amplexuses: third person singular present of amplexus
meanings.sent1: She amplexuses her partner tightly during the dance.
meanings.sent2: The tree frog amplexuses the branch for support.

meanings.sent5: The spider amplexuses its prey before consuming it.
